Northland students to honour Māori Battalion tupuna at 80th anniversary of battle for Monte Cassino in Italy https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-students-to-honour-maori-battalion-tupuna-at-80th-anniversary-of-battle-for-monte-cassino-in-意大利/5DHOTSGMVREVBG3L66PNXWSOWQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northland-students-to-honour-maori-battalion-tupuna-at-80th-anniversary-of-battle-for-monte-cassino-in-意大利/5DHOTSGMVREVBG3L66PNXWSOWQ/ Mike DinsdaleMāori Battalion's Monte Cassino sacrifices honoured by Northland students Sun, 12 May 2024 21:00:30 +0000 The Leadership Academy of A Company students, Corporals Kreize Cooper-Brown, Sandreuss Shortland and Tamati Paraone - here in front of photos of the Māori Battalion members each intake is named after - will be retracing the footsteps of their tupuna in the Māori Battalion when they visit Italy including Monte Cassino and Florence, Greece and Crete.
